QTCoord Class Reference

This is a helper class used to specify a coord in the quadtree. More...

#include <quad_tree.hpp>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

void clipMin ()
 This method makes sure that the coordinate is not outside the bottom and and left sides.

 This method makes sure that the coordinate is not outside the right and top sides.
int findChild (int depth) const
 This method returns the quadrant that a child coord is in.

Detailed Description

This is a helper class used to specify a coord in the quadtree.
